AD_SEARCHDEFINITION.DESCRIPTION: Searches for an order with a fitting documentNo
AD_SEARCHDEFINITION.NAME: Order Search

AD_SEARCHDEFINITION.DESCRIPTION: Searches for a Business Partner with fitting BPName or ContactName
AD_SEARCHDEFINITION.NAME: Business Partner Search
AD_SEARCHDEFINITION.QUERY: SELECT b.C_BPartner_ID FROM C_BPartner b INNER JOIN AD_User u ON (b.C_BPartner_ID = u.C_BPartner_ID) WHERE UPPER(b.name) LIKE UPPER(?) OR UPPER(u.name) LIKE UPPER(?)
